parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rack and pinion can cause the power steering to malfunction, making it difficult to steer the vehicle, which can increase the risk of accidents, especially at low speeds.
symptoms: The power steering is hard to turn
the power steering goes out while driving
the steering wheel feels stiff or difficult to turn
the vehicle is difficult to maneuver.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: ABS Malfunction and Brake Pedal Pulsation
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the Anti-lock Braking System (ABS) can cause a loss of braking power, leading to extended stopping distances, and potentially resulting in accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The brake pedal pulsates or vibrates when pressed
the ABS system engages unnecessarily
the brake pedal goes to the floor
the vehicle takes longer to stop
and the ABS brake light illuminates on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Brake Pedal Sinking or Going to the Floor
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The brake pedal sinking or going to the floor can cause a loss of braking power, leading to extended stopping distances, and potentially resulting in accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The brake pedal feels soft or spongy
the brake pedal goes to the floor
the vehicle takes longer to stop
and the brake pedal has a delayed return to its normal position.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power antenna can cause excessive heat generation, leading to a potential fire hazard, and drain the vehicle's battery, leaving the driver stranded.
symptoms: The power antenna motor runs continuously
generating excessive heat
the antenna does not retract or extend properly
the antenna motor makes a loud or unusual noise
the vehicle's battery drains rapidly
the vehicle's electrical system is affected.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ignition system can cause the vehicle to stall while driving, which can lead to accidents, especially if it occurs at high speeds or in heavy traffic.
symptoms: The vehicle stalls or dies while driving
the engine loses power
the vehicle is difficult to start or will not start at all.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the driver's seat belt buckle can increase the risk of injury or fatality in the event of an accident, as the driver may not be properly restrained.
symptoms: The seat belt buckle breaks or cracks
the seat belt will not latch
the seat belt will not stay securely fastened
the driver is unable to buckle their seat belt.
